Package org.anchoranalysis.test

Class TestLoader

Object
TestLoader
public class TestLoader
extends Object
Loads test data, which is found at some location on the file-system
Author:
Owen Feehan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean areXmlEqual​(Document doc1, Document doc2)
    Does a check if the XML documents are equal
    void copyToDirectory​(File dirDest)
    Copies all the data in the test-data folder (recursively), preserving file-dates
    void copyToDirectory​(String[] subdirectoriesSrc, File dirDest)
    Copies specific subdirectories from the test-data folder (recursively), preserving file-dates

  • Method Details

    • createFromMavenWorkingDirectory

      public static TestLoader createFromMavenWorkingDirectory()
      Creates a new test-data loader finding "src/test/resources" using the Maven working directory
      Returns:
      a loader associated with MAVEN_WORKING_DIR/src/test/resources/

    • createFromMavenWorkingDirectory

      public static TestLoader createFromMavenWorkingDirectory​(String toAppendToDirectory)
      Creates a new test-data loader finding "src/test/resources/PLUS_SOMETHING" using the Maven working directory
      Parameters:
      toAppendToDirectory - appended to maven working dir to determine final directory
      Returns:
      a loader associated with the MAVEN_WORKING_DIR/src/test/resources/PLUS_SOMETHING

    • createFromExplicitDirectory

      public static TestLoader createFromExplicitDirectory​(String rootDirectory)
      Creates a new test-data loader using an explicit File path as root
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - the path where the root folder is
      Returns:
      a loader associated with the explicit root

    • createFromExplicitDirectory

      public static TestLoader createFromExplicitDirectory​(Path rootDirectory)
      Creates a new test-data loader using an explicit File path as root
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - the path where the root folder is
      Returns:
      a loader associated with the explicit root

    • createForSubdirectory

      public TestLoader createForSubdirectory​(String subdirectory)
      Creates a new test-loader for a subdirectory of the current test
      Parameters:
      subdirectory - the subdirectory to use (relative path to the current root)
      Returns:
      the new test-loader

    • resolveTestPath

      public Path resolveTestPath​(String testPath)
      Resolves a path to test-data (relative path to the test-data root) to an absolute path on the file system
      Parameters:
      testPath - relative-path of a test-data item. It is relative to the test-data root.
      Returns:
      the resolved-path

    • doesPathExist

      public boolean doesPathExist​(String testFilePath)
      Does a resource exist with a particular folderPath + fileName
      Parameters:
      testFilePath - path to a file in the test-data
      Returns:
      true if a file is found at the location, false otherwise

    • doesPathExist

      public boolean doesPathExist​(String testFolderPath, String fileName)
      Does a resource exist with a particular folderPath + fileName
      Parameters:
      testFolderPath - path to a folder in the test-data (can be empty)
      fileName - a filename in the testFolderPath
      Returns:
      true if a file is found at the location, false otherwise

    • printAllFilesFromTestFolderPath

      public void printAllFilesFromTestFolderPath​(String testFolderPath)
      Prints the names of all files (recursively) in a test-folder to stdout
      Parameters:
      testFolderPath - path to a folder in the test-data (can be empty)

    • openXmlFromTestPath

      public Document openXmlFromTestPath​(String testPath)
      Opens a XML document - with a path relative to the test root
      Parameters:
      testPath - the path to the xml file (relative to the test root)
      Returns:
      the XML document

    • openXmlAbsoluteFilePath

      public static Document openXmlAbsoluteFilePath​(String filePath)
      Opens a XML document - with an absolute path on the filesystem
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the xml file (absolute path)
      Returns:
      the XML document

    • openXmlAbsoluteFilePath

      public static Document openXmlAbsoluteFilePath​(Path filePath)
      Opens a XML document - with an absolute path on the filesystem
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the xml file (absolute path)
      Returns:
      the XML document

    • areXmlEqual

      public static boolean areXmlEqual​(Document doc1, Document doc2)
      Does a check if the XML documents are equal

      Note that both objects are normalized during the check, and their state changes permanently.

      Parameters:
      doc1 - first document
      doc2 - second document
      Returns:
      true if their contents match, false otherwise

    • copyToDirectory

      public void copyToDirectory​(File dirDest) throws IOException
      Copies all the data in the test-data folder (recursively), preserving file-dates
      Parameters:
      dirDest - destination-folder
      Throws:
      IOException - if a copy error occurs

    • copyToDirectory

      public void copyToDirectory​(String[] subdirectoriesSrc, File dirDest) throws IOException
      Copies specific subdirectories from the test-data folder (recursively), preserving file-dates
      Parameters:
      subdirectoriesSrc - which subdirectories to copy from (their full-path is preserved)
      dirDest - destination-folder
      Throws:
      IOException - if a copy error occurs
